text: Photo: Courtesy of Van Cleef & Arpels See more photos of: Jaeger-LeCoultre Rendez-Vous Night & Day medium yellow gold, $15,000 Photo: Courtesy of Jaeger-LeCoultre See more photos of: Expand Cartier Trait D’Eclat watch 18-karat white gold 15 oval-shaped rubies from Mozambique for 24.93 cts, 590 brilliant-cut diamonds, 16 baguette-cut diamonds, mechanical movement with manual winding, unique piece, price upon request Photo: Courtesy of Cartier See more photos of: Expand Van Cleef & Arpels Emerald Cadenas timepiece featuring emeralds and diamonds set in 18-karat white gold, price upon request
